title: Frames to Fill Your (Gallery) Walls
text:
Mansion Global has highlighted these products and services because we think readers will find them useful. We may earn a commission if you buy products through our links, but our recommendations are independent of any compensation that we may receive.

Art and photos have the power to transform your walls from everyday to extraordinary, giving them character and a point of view. But, often, hanging these treasures can be a matter of finding the right way to protect and perfect them.



Whether you have pictures and prints that need framing or are looking for a collection of pre-framed art, we found an inspiring selection of both to spark your creativity.



Here are some ways to make any blank space sing.



Manhattan Frame Set in Stainless Steel

Crafted from brushed stainless steel, this Manhattan Frame Set in Stainless Steel from Room and Board comes with four large-scale hand-welded frames in two different sizes. The graphic nature of the frames creates a modernist vibe for photos or artwork. Hang them all together for a look that feels instantly curated.

The Manhattan Frame Set in Stainless Steel is available for $396.

More: Accessorize Your Living Room With Stylish Accents

Wexel Art 21x27-Inch Popster Plus Magnetic Single Panel Framing Grade Acrylic Floating Frame

One of the best ways to show off a prized print, photo or drawing is in a floating acrylic frame such as the Wexel Art 21x27-Inch Popster Plus Magnetic Single Panel Framing Grade Acrylic Floating Frame. The simple system uses four magnets to hold your work in place—and is easy enough to let you switch it out any time if you want. Use just one frame for a statement piece or hang various sizes to create an assorted display.

The Wexel Art 21x27-Inch Popster Plus Magnetic Single Panel Framing Grade Acrylic Floating Frame is available for around $120.



Framebridge The Endless Organic

With The Framebridge Endless Organic collection, in one fell swoop, you can transform a wall into a photo gallery that looks like it was amassed over time. You design each frame yourself (there are 22 in total) by choosing from a variety of materials and uploading your digital photos online. By varying the types of frames, you’ll create a more inspired presentation. The company will even send you a life-size hanging guide to make installation a cinch.



The Framebridge Endless Organic collection is available for $1,550.

From Penta: Rare Whiskey Remains World’s Best-Performing Luxury Asset

Soicher Marin Susan Hable Collage Series VI

If you’re looking to make your blank walls quickly come to life, investing in a pre-framed art collection is the easiest way to fill the space. Soicher Marin Susan Hable Collage Series VI available at One Kings Lane is a set of six abstract works on paper that comes ready to hang. The poppy collection lends a burst of color and a modernist vibe over a living room sofa, in a dining room or along a hallway. Wherever you hang these giclée prints, they’ll spark conversation.

The Soicher Marin Susan Hable Collage Series VI is available for $2,995.
